meanings.sent1: The panmictic nature of the population allowed for diverse genetic combinations.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the panmictic behavior of the species in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The panmictic party of animals mixed and mingled freely, creating a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: In the panmictic world of colors, every hue blended seamlessly into the next.
meanings.sent5: Her wardrobe was a panmictic collection of patterns and styles, reflecting her eclectic taste.

meanings.definition: Characterized by random mating within a population.
meanings.sent1: The panmictic population ensured genetic diversity through random mating.
meanings.sent2: In a panmictic community, individuals choose their partners without any restrictions.
meanings.sent3: The panmictic dance party was a chaotic mix of partners swirling around the floor.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a panmictic lottery, where chance brought them together.
meanings.sent5: The panmictic nature of the group led to surprising pairings and unexpected connections.
